title: Tips on ganking Heimerdinger
body: I am having trouble, as most jungling champions,  successfully ganking Heimerdinger. Sometimes the lanner dies during the gank, sometimes I die from unexpected damage during the gank . Any tips on when to gank him or how?

replies.body: Well one would be to smite his ulti turret as soon as he spawns it. That thing needs to be dead
I don't think smite does enough to kill it in one shot though (level 6)

I've played Hiemer alot recently, and found that he's easy to ganked in his turrent nest. With two people ganking him. They do it just like turret diving one attacks then taking his aggro from turrets then the second comes attack switching the aggro. They do this back and forth for 3-4 seconds and I die. 


side note : 5-6 seconds if i have barrier and hourglass.

I have yet to find a counter to this ganking madness and quit playing hiemer in pubs bc of it.
Thanks ill try this next time!

Play Nunu bot.

Smite 1 turret, Consume another, the spam laugh.

Smite the turrets...

Seriously, smite his turrets. Even if you can't gank, go out of your way to smite his turrets. It will help your laner farm more with less harassment.
I usually don't gank him unless I'm Sion (In which case I can E his turrets away), or I have some decent MR built.
